name: Falinks

passive.name: Battle Formation
passive.effect: When you put a Pokemon named Falinks on the Bench, put it in play under this Pokemon instead. This Pokemon has 30 more HP for each Falinks underneath it.

attacks.name: Team Attack
attacks.effect: This attack costs 1 colorless more for each Falinks you have in play (including this one). Deal 20 damage times the number of Falinks you have in play (including this one).

flavor: Brave warriors that never shy away from battle. Convincing them to retreat is hard.
